testcase.purpose: Validate if sample app spacedodge can be built on android device which is 'arm/x86' architecture

step.step_desc: If com.example.spacedodge exists in apptools-sampleapp-tests/tools/ directory, remove it Then run below commands under apptools-sampleapp-tests/tools/ directory: On Linux or OS X host: Shared Mode: $ crosswalk-app create com.example.spacedodge --android-shared Embedded Mode: $ crosswalk-app create com.example.spacedodge Lite Mode: $ crosswalk-app create com.example.spacedodge --android-lite $ cd com.example.spacedodge $ git clone https://github.com/crosswalk-project/crosswalk-samples.git $ mv crosswalk-samples/space-dodge-game/base/* app/ Update "xwalk_version" to "xwalk_app_version" in app/manifest.json file Add '"xwalk_package_id": "com.example.spacedodge", "xwalk_target_platforms": "android"' to app/manifest.json file $ crosswalk-app build On Windows host: Shared Mode: $ node %crosswalk-app% create com.example.spacedodge --android-shared Embedded Mode: $ node %crosswalk-app% create com.example.spacedodge Lite Mode: $ node %crosswalk-app% create com.example.spacedodge --android-lite $ cd com.example.spacedodge $ git clone https://github.com/crosswalk-project/crosswalk-samples.git $ xcopy /s /e /i /y crosswalk-samples\space-dodge-game\base\* app\ Update "xwalk_version" to "xwalk_app_version" in app\manifest.json file Add '"xwalk_package_id": "com.example.spacedodge", "xwalk_target_platforms": "android"' to app\manifest.json file $ node %crosswalk-app% build

Shared Mode: Install shared mode spacedodge app on your android device which is "arm" architecture Install shared mode spacedodge app on your android device which is "x86" architecture Embedded Mode or Lite Mode: Install arm spacedodge app on your android device which is "arm" architecture Install x86 spacedodge app on your android device which is "x86" architecture
Check icon of spacedodge app in your android device
Launch spacedodge app in your android device
Check the homepage of spacedodge app
step.expected: You can see spacedodge UI on the device

step.step_desc: Uninstall the app when it is running
Install and launch the spacedodge app again. Close spacedodge app via clicking the home button, and kill spacedodge app from Task Manager
Long press the icon of spacedodge app to uninstall it
